member.name: EMRPOLYDRAW16
member.summary: The EMRPOLYDRAW16 structure contains members for the enhanced metafile record.

member.name: EMRPOLYDRAW16.emr
member.summary: The base structure for all record types.

member.name: EMRPOLYDRAW16.rclBounds
member.summary: The bounding rectangle, in device units.

member.name: EMRPOLYDRAW16.apts
member.summary: An array of structures, representing the data points in logical units.

member.name: EMRPOLYDRAW16.abTypes
member.summary: An array of values that specifies how each point in the apts array is used. Each element can be one of the following values: PT_MOVETO, PT_LINETO, or PT_BEZIERTO. The PT_LINETO or PT_BEZIERTO value can be combined with the PT_CLOSEFIGURE value using the bitwise-OR operator.
